list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hard solid nonmetallic mineral matter of which rock is made, especially as a building material.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the houses are built of stone
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những ngôi nhà được xây dựng bằng đá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of stone shaped for a purpose, especially one of commemoration, ceremony, or demarcation.
a hard seed in a cherry, plum, peach, and some other fruits.
a natural shade of whitish-gray or brownish-gray.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: three vehicles were stoned and torched
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ba xe đã bị ném đá và bị bỏ rơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: build, face, or pave with stone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: thành phố mật ong bị ném đá, thế kỷ thứ mười tám
